sys_script_include.name: TaskUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_5f50bb6f830b2210de39f120feaad3ab
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1790195_event_ma.TaskUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TaskUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var TaskUtils = Class.create();
TaskUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function(eventid) {
        this.eventid = eventid;
    },
    getTasks: function() {
        var res = [];
        var eventtask = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_task');
        eventtask.addQuery('x_event_id', this.eventid);
        eventtask.query();
        if (eventtask.next()) {
            res.push({
                id: eventtask.getDisplayValue()
            });
        }
        return JSON.stringify(res);

    },
    Overdue: function(taskid) {

        var curr = new GlideDateTime();
        var eventtask = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_task');
        eventtask.addQuery('number', taskid);
        eventtask.query();
        if (eventtask.next()) {
            if (eventtask.getValue('x_due_date') > curr)
                return "OverDue";
        }
        return 'Due';
    },
    getTaskById: function(taskid) {
        var res = [];
        var eventtask = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_task');
        eventtask.addQuery('number', taskid);
        eventtask.query();
        if (eventtask.next()) {
            res.push({
                id: eventtask.getDisplayValue(),
                name: eventtask.getValue('x_task_name')
            });
        }
        return JSON.stringify(res);
    },
    getTaskByDate: function(duedate) {
        var res = [];
        var eventtask = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_task');
        eventtask.addQuery('x_due_date', duedate);
        eventtask.query();
        if (eventtask.next()) {
            res.push({
                id: eventtask.getDisplayValue(),
                name: eventtask.getValue('x_task_name')
            });
        }
        return JSON.stringify(res);
    },

    type: 'TaskUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-05 14:38:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>5f50bb6f830b2210de39f120feaad3ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TaskUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Event Management &amp; Planning System" source="x_1790195_event_ma">133c05db83032210de39f120feaad3a8</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Event Management &amp; Planning System">133c05db83032210de39f120feaad3a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5f50bb6f830b2210de39f120feaad3ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-05 14:38:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
